question: 查找工资高于平均工资的医生
sql: SELECT name, salary FROM doctor_info WHERE salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM doctor_info);

question: 查找工资等于主任医师平均工资的医生
sql: SELECT name, salary FROM doctor_info WHERE salary = (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM doctor_info WHERE title='主任医师');

question: 找出工资高于同科室平均工资的医生
sql: SELECT name, dept_id, salary FROM doctor_info WHERE salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM doctor_info d2 WHERE d2.dept_id = doctor_info.dept_id);

question: 查找属于平均工资最高职称的医生
sql: SELECT `doctor_id`, `name`, `title`, `salary` FROM `testdb`.`doctor_info` WHERE `title` = (SELECT `title` FROM `testdb`.`doctor_info` WHERE `title` IS NOT NULL GROUP BY `title` ORDER BY AVG(`salary`) DESC LIMIT 1);

question: 找出药品价格高于本类别平均价格的药品
sql: SELECT name, category, unit_price FROM medicine_info WHERE unit_price > (SELECT AVG(unit_price) FROM medicine_info m2 WHERE m2.category = medicine_info.category);

question: 工资高于平均工资的医生有哪些？
sql: SELECT name, salary FROM doctor_info WHERE salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM doctor_info);

question: 工资低于平均工资的护士有哪些？
sql: SELECT name, salary FROM nurse_info WHERE salary < (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM nurse_info);

question: 药品价格高于平均价格的药品
sql: SELECT name, unit_price FROM medicine_info WHERE unit_price > (SELECT AVG(unit_price) FROM medicine_info);

question: 床位数低于平均床位数的医院
sql: SELECT name, total_beds FROM hospital_info WHERE total_beds < (SELECT AVG(total_beds) FROM hospital_info);

question: 年龄高于平均年龄的病人
sql: SELECT name, age FROM patient_info WHERE age > (SELECT AVG(age) FROM patient_info);

question: 查找工资高于20000元的医生
sql: SELECT name, CAST(salary AS DECIMAL(10,2)) AS salary FROM doctor_info WHERE CAST(salary AS DECIMAL(10,2)) > 20000;

question: 查找药品单价大于10元的药品
sql: SELECT name, CAST(unit_price AS DECIMAL(10,2)) FROM medicine_info WHERE CAST(unit_price AS DECIMAL(10,2)) > 10;

question: 查询床位数大于300的医院
sql: SELECT name, CAST(total_beds AS SIGNED) AS beds FROM hospital_info WHERE CAST(total_beds AS SIGNED) > 300;

question: 找出年龄大于40岁的病人
sql: SELECT name, CAST(age AS SIGNED) AS age FROM patient_info WHERE CAST(age AS SIGNED) > 40;

question: 查询库存数量少于100的药品
sql: SELECT name, CAST(stock_quantity AS SIGNED) AS stock FROM medicine_info WHERE CAST(stock_quantity AS SIGNED) < 100;

question: 查询工资在20000到30000之间的医生
sql: SELECT name, salary FROM doctor_info WHERE salary BETWEEN 20000 AND 30000;

question: 查找年龄在30到40岁之间的病人
sql: SELECT name, age FROM patient_info WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;

question: 统计药品价格在5元到20元之间的药品数量
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM medicine_info WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 5 AND 20;

question: 查找2025年1月1日至1月31日入院的病人
sql: SELECT name FROM patient_info WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2025-01-01' AND '2025-01-31';

question: 查询医院成立时间在2000年至2010年间的医院
sql: SELECT name FROM hospital_info WHERE established_date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2010-12-31';

question: 查找住院超过7天的病人
sql: SELECT name, DATEDIFF(discharge_date, admission_date) AS stay_days FROM patient_info WHERE DATEDIFF(discharge_date, admission_date) > 7;

question: 计算每位病人住院天数
sql: SELECT name, DATEDIFF(discharge_date, admission_date) AS stay_days FROM patient_info;

question: 统计住院时间超过30天的病人数量
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_info WHERE DATEDIFF(discharge_date, admission_date) > 30;

question: 查找设备距离上次维护超过90天的记录
sql: SELECT * FROM `testdb`.`equipment_info` WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), `last_maintenance`) > 90 AND `last_maintenance` IS NOT NULL LIMIT 1000;

question: 统计出院天数超过10天的病人
sql: SELECT name FROM patient_info WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), discharge_date) > 10;
